title: Hands On: Complete Rival eTap AXS wireless road group with actual weights
content:
SRAM just announced that their eTap AXS family now includes Rival. That’s big news for riders who may not want to pay top dollar for a drivetrain, but still want premium performance. But what does a more affordable wireless group mean for the gram scales? Of course we have the answer… Shifters and Brakes Along […]

The post Hands On: Complete Rival eTap AXS wireless road group with actual weights appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
